familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received Over $5,000,000 in Capital Gains income from 2 Rector Kushner Member LLC (Commercial Real Estate in New York, NY) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump''s senior adviser. Jared Kushner served as Managing Member of 2 Rector Kushner Member, LLC from Jun 1, 2013, to Mar 1, 2016. Although Jared Kushner has resigned his position(s) with this entity, it is also disclosed an asset; therefore, this database marks the potential conflict of interest as active.
familyMemberEthics.business: 2 Rector Kushner Member LLC (Commercial Real Estate In New York, NY)
